alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 08 at 2:51AM CST until February 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible along and northwest of a line from Iowa City to Dubuque. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, including a potentially significant amount of sleet. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph late Thursday. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Illinois and east central and southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
